events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's issue has been categorized under Refund due to the request for money back after receiving an incorrect product.
Customer support agent Mia has been assigned to handle the refund request for the wrong product delivery.
Hello! I understand you received the wrong item, and Iâ€™m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received and your order number so I can verify your purchase and proceed?
Attached are the photos of the product I was sent, along with my order confirmation number for your reference.
Thank you for the details. We will arrange a full refund and provide you with a prepaid label to return the incorrect item.
That sounds great, thanks for resolving this quickly. I appreciate the prompt response and clear instructions.
The refund has been processed successfully, and you should see the amount credited to your account within 5-7 business days.
Just following up to confirm that your refund was received and if there is anything else we can assist you with today.
As we have not heard back, we are closing this refund case. Please contact us again if you need further assistance.
